settings.title: Settings
settings.showShortcutsDescription: Display keyboard shortcuts in tooltips and UI elements. For example:

exclusive.title: Exclusive Mode
exclusive.disabledDesc: Shared mode with OS audio mixer

graphicEq.title: Graphic Equalizer
graphicEq.info: Adjust frequency bands to shape your sound. Drag sliders up to boost or down to cut. The 10 bands follow ISO standard center frequencies.

resampling.applyOnNextTrack: Resampling settings will apply on next track

settings.aboutDescription: Local-first music player with high-quality audio playback and professional audio processing pipeline.

sources.title: Sources
sources.description: Manage music sources and server connections
sources.serverSourcesDescription: Connect to Soul Player servers for streaming and sync

librarySettings.watchedFoldersDescription: Folders to scan for music files
librarySettings.syncDeletes: Remove tracks when files are deleted
librarySettings.forceRefreshDescription: Re-extract metadata for all files, even unchanged ones. Use this to fix missing artist/album info.
librarySettings.externalFilesDescription: How to handle files opened from outside the app

errors.duplicatePath: This folder is already added to your library

import.title: Import Music
import.releaseToAdd: Release to add to your library
import.playNowDescription: Play immediately without adding to library
import.importToLibraryDescription: Add to your music library for permanent access

artist.noArtistsHint: Import music to see your artists

genre.noGenresHint: Genre information is extracted from your music files

playlist.name: Playlist Name
playlist.createHint: Create a playlist to organize your music
playlist.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this playlist? This cannot be undone.
playlist.removeTrackMessage: Remove this track from the playlist?

upload.title: Upload to Server
upload.subtitle: Sync your music to a Soul Player server
upload.addServerHint: Add and authenticate a server in Settings > Sources
upload.syncAllTracks: Sync all tracks to the server
upload.completeDescription: Your music has been uploaded to the server

crossfeed.title: Crossfeed
crossfeed.subtitle: Headphone soundstage enhancement
crossfeed.explanation: Crossfeed adds subtle channel mixing to simulate how speakers sound in a room. This reduces the extreme stereo separation of headphones, making long listening sessions more comfortable and natural.
crossfeed.cutoffExplanation: Higher frequencies are more directional. Lower cutoff values apply crossfeed only to bass and midrange, preserving stereo imaging in the highs.

presets.naturalDesc: Subtle crossfeed for a natural soundstage. Best for most listeners.
presets.relaxedDesc: Moderate crossfeed for casual, fatigue-free listening.
presets.meierDesc: Classic algorithm with pronounced effect. Based on Jan Meier's research.

warning.title: Ceiling at 0dB
warning.description: A ceiling at 0dB may cause inter-sample peaks and clipping on some playback systems. Consider using -0.1dB or lower for safe headroom.

info.title: Brick-wall Limiting
info.description: A limiter prevents audio from exceeding the ceiling threshold. Use it to prevent clipping and control peaks. Shorter release times are more aggressive, longer times are more transparent.

convolution.title: Convolution Reverb
convolution.preDelayDesc: Adds space before the reverb starts, simulating room distance
convolution.presetsNote: These presets use bundled impulse responses optimized for music listening
convolution.notAvailableDesc: The convolution engine could not be initialized. Please check that your audio device is properly configured.
convolution.infoText: Convolution reverb uses real-world acoustic recordings (impulse responses) to create realistic reverb effects. Load IR files from recording studios, concert halls, or guitar cabinets to add space and character to your audio.

presets.largeHallDesc: Concert hall with long reverb tail

errors.loadFailed: Failed to load impulse response file

compressor.title: Compressor
compressor.ratioHelp: Amount of compression (4:1 = 4dB input becomes 1dB output above threshold)
compressor.kneeHelp: Softens the transition at threshold (0 = hard, higher = softer)

preset.gentleDesc: Subtle compression for vocals and acoustic instruments
preset.transparentDesc: Very subtle, wide knee for natural dynamics
preset.punchyDesc: Fast attack for punch and impact
preset.vocalDesc: Optimized for voice with smooth attack
preset.limitingDesc: High ratio, fast attack for brick-wall limiting

info.title: Dynamic Range Compression
info.description: A compressor reduces the dynamic range by attenuating signals above the threshold. Use it to control peaks, add sustain, or glue elements together.

stereo.midSideExplanation: Mid contains the center (mono) content like vocals and bass. Side contains the stereo difference like reverbs and wide instruments. Adjusting these independently gives precise control over your stereo image.
stereo.monoWarningDescription: Width above 150% may cause phase issues when played back in mono. Some audio content may cancel out or sound hollow on mono systems.
stereo.tip1: Boost Mid to emphasize vocals and center instruments
stereo.tip2: Boost Side to widen the stereo image and add spaciousness
stereo.tip3: Cut Side to reduce excessive stereo width or reverb

parametricEq.title: Parametric EQ
parametricEq.tipDrag: Drag nodes to adjust frequency and gain
parametricEq.tipQ: Lower Q values create wider curves, higher Q creates narrower peaks
parametricEq.tipTypes: Use shelf filters for broad tonal adjustments, bell for surgical cuts

onboarding.welcomeSubtitle: How would you like to manage your music library?
onboarding.chooseThemeDescription: Select a visual style for Soul Player
onboarding.useExistingFoldersDescription: Point Soul Player to folders where you already have music.
onboarding.letSoulOrganizeDescription: Import files into an organized library managed by Soul Player.
onboarding.useBoth: Use both (I'll set this up myself)
onboarding.changeLater: You can always change this later in Settings
onboarding.changeLaterSkip: You can always change this in settings, skip
onboarding.addMusicFoldersDescription: Soul Player will scan these folders and keep them in sync. Your files will never be moved or modified.
onboarding.chooseLibraryLocationDescription: Soul Player will organize your music in this folder. Files you import will be copied here with a clean structure.
onboarding.allSetDescription: Your library is being set up. This may take a moment...

hero.subtitle:
Local-first music player,
optional self-hosted multi-user streaming server,
optional paid* discovery

features.title: Why Soul Player?
features.subtitle: Built for music lovers who value control, quality, and privacy

multiSource.title: Multi-Source Support
multiSource.description: Play from local files, network shares, or your personal server. One library, multiple sources.
multiSource.technical: Trait-based architecture supports local, streaming, and network audio sources

effects.title: Advanced Effects Chain
effects.description: Parametric EQ, dynamic compression, and custom effects. Professional audio quality.
effects.technical: Real-time DSP with zero-allocation audio processing callbacks

multiUser.title: Multi-User from Day 1
multiUser.description: Personal libraries, shared playlists, user authentication. Built for families and teams.
multiUser.technical: SQLite schema designed for multi-tenancy across all platforms

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform Native
crossPlatform.description: Desktop (Windows, macOS, Linux), server streaming, and embedded hardware. Seamless experience everywhere.
crossPlatform.technical: Native desktop apps, containerized server, and dedicated hardware support

privacy.title: Privacy-First, Self-Hosted
privacy.description: Your music, your server, your data. No tracking, no subscriptions, no cloud lock-in.
privacy.technical: Local-first architecture with optional server sync

discovery.title: Optional Discovery Service
discovery.description: Bandcamp & Discogs integration, metadata enhancement, lyrics, AcoustID fingerprinting.
discovery.technical: Join our community subscription for enhanced discovery features

comparison.title: Why Listen With Us?
comparison.subtitle: Soul Player combines the best of local players and self-hosted streaming
